title: Webqoof: Jignesh Mevani Shares Photoshopped Image of Yogi, Sri Sri
subtitle: Tweet by Gujarat MLA and youth leader Jignesh Mevani, along with a photograph comparing UP CM Yogi Adityanath, ‘spiritual guru’  Sri Sri Ravi Shankar and columnist with Swarajya magazine, Shefali Vaidya with a still from a movie.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim: I am told that this is a photoshoped image. Apologies for posting it without verification. Deleting my previous tweet now and will be careful in future.We all should be careful abt this and whenever we get to know that it's fabricated we should delete ithttps://t.co/Iw5FnxINe5
